amendment.description: Amendment sought to suspend the application of the Federal definition of marriage when a State provides for a definition different than that which is provided in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to suspend the federal definition of marriage contained in the bill when a state, through normal democratic procedures, establishes a different definition.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Frank (MA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 103 - 311 (Roll no. 314).
